title: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom \u2013 Prince's Edition
description: Ni no Kuni II: Revenant Kingdom is an action role-playing game developed by Level-5 and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game is a sequel to Ni no Kuni: Wrath of the White Witch, and was released for Microsoft Windows and PlayStation 4 on March 23, 2018. The game is set to be released for the Nintendo Switch on September 17, 2021.
